## ‚úÖ Implementation Complete

### Summary
Implemented the Linear-style rich text editor with all requested features.

### Features Added
- **Slash commands (/)** - Type / to access formatting options
- **@ mentions** - Type @ to mention assignees
- **# task links** - Type # to link to other tasks
- **Code blocks** with syntax highlighting (lowlight)
- **Markdown support** - Bold, italic, lists, quotes
- **Horizontal dividers**

### Files Created/Modified
- src/components/rich-text-editor/slash-commands.tsx
- src/components/rich-text-editor/mentions.tsx
